name: RΛZΞR Bot
description: A Telegram Powerful Group Managment Bot written in Python using Pyrogram and Telethon

TOKEN.description: Your bot token. Get one from @BotFather

API_ID.description: Get API_ID from my.telegram.org, used for telethon based modules.

API_HASH.description: Get API_HASH from my.telegram.org, used for telethon based modules.

SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URI.description: Your postgresql db url. If you don't have it, leave it empty.

OWNER_ID.description: Your user ID as an integer.

BOT_ID.description: Your bot's User ID. Use any other bot to get it.

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Your Heroku API key, get it from 'https://dashboard.heroku.com/account'

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Enter the Heroku app name here (Must an exact same name with your input above).

UPDATE_CHANNEL.description: Your Telegram Bot Update Channel username Without @ like: Razer312Updates.

SUPPORT_CHAT.description: Your Telegram support group chat username Without @ like: Razer312Support.

START_IMG.description: Enter Your Bot Image Telegraph Link

EVENT_LOGS.description: Event logs channel to note down important bot level events, recommend to make this public. Starts with: '-100'

JOIN_LOGGER.description: A channel where bot will print who added it to what group, useful during debugging or spam handling. Starts with: '-100'

DEV_USERS.description: ID of users who are Devs of your bot (can use /sh /eval etc.).

STRICT_GBAN.description: Enforce gbans across new groups as well as old groups. When a gbanned user talks, he will be banned.

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable environment variables. Leave it as it is
